trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The vengeful Nu Mou is bent on revenge.
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the mock ancient texts to the pixies.
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_TODO_01<tab>Report to the vengeful Nu Mou.
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_ANGRYNUMOU03414_000_000<tab>Grrr, those accursed pixies! I never should've trusted them!

TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_ANGRYNUMOU03414_000_001<tab>I asked them for sheep's milk. They demanded their payment first, and against my better judgment, I gave it to them. I've not seen neither hide nor hair of them since!
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_ANGRYNUMOU03414_000_002<tab>But they will rue the day they cheated this Nu Mou! I'll get my revenge─with your help, mortal!

TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_ANGRYNUMOU03414_000_003<tab>Your task is simple. Take these mock ancient texts I've prepared and give them to the pixies. The rest should play out by itself, and I will have my revenge─and you your fitting payment!
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_ANGRYNUMOU03414_000_004<tab>And if the pixies think to ask where the texts come from, just say that you found it at the Church at Dammroen Field.

TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_ANGRYNUMOU03414_000_005<tab>Please find the cheating pixies and give them the mock ancient texts. The rest should play out by itself, and I will have my revenge─and you your fitting payment!
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_EARHUSTLERPIXIEA03414_000_010<tab>Hm? You wish to give me something, you say?

TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_EARHUSTLERPIXIEA03414_000_011<tab>Ooh, it says here there's a secret flower garden! And the way will be revealed if one makes an offering of sheep's milk to the leafman north of here!
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_EARHUSTLERPIXIEA03414_000_012<tab>Tee hee, I must go and tell everyone...right after I've had my fill of the garden!
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_EARHUSTLERPIXIEB03414_000_012<tab>Well now, what's a mortal doing here?
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_EARHUSTLERPIXIEB03414_000_013<tab>This was at the church? Let's see, now... <gasp> It tells you the way to get to a secret garden!
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_EARHUSTLERPIXIEB03414_000_014<tab>All you need is sheep's milk, and it just so happens we have the extra we didn't give the Nu Mou! I'll go and test it out at once!
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_ANGRYNUMOU03414_000_020<tab>You gave the pixies the texts, and they believed it? Hah hah hah! Such sweet revenge!
TEXT_LUCKZD007_03414_ANGRYNUMOU03414_000_021<tab>Here, mortal─the fitting payment for your excellent service! Now, if you'll excuse me, I have sheep's milk to collect!
